resource.title: The Psychology of Money: Timeless lessons on wealth, greed, and happiness
resource.author: Morgan Housel

reason: High-quality wealth philosophy already covered by Phil Town Rule #1 and Bauer psychology lessons. Book optimizes for 30+ year wealth accumulation, not daily income trading execution.

already_covered_by: Phil Town Rule #1: Don't lose money (Z5chrxMuBoo)
new_concepts_not_actionable: Tails You Win - we sell premium, don't bet on tails
Wealth is what you don't see - personal finance philosophy
You'll Change - too philosophical for trading system

key_distinction.housel_focus: Wealth accumulation over 30+ years through passive investing
key_distinction.our_focus: Consistent daily income ($14-25/day) from credit spread options
key_distinction.conclusion: Complementary philosophies but different optimization targets

recommendation: Do NOT invest 5+ hours in audiobook. Core concepts already implemented. If curious, read 10-minute summary instead.
one_sentence_summary: Great book for long-term wealth building, but we already have Rule #1 which covers the same core principle for our trading context.
